name: IgSimulator
tagline: IgSimulator is a versatile tool for simulation of immunoglobulin repertoire
body:
IgRepertoireConstructor is a tool for construction of antibody repertoire from Illumina Ig-Seq library.
IgRepertoireConstructor takes as an input immunosequencing reads that cover variable regions of antibodies and returns antibody repertoire constructed from the given reads as its output.
![oppa](http://bioinf.spbau.ru/sites/default/files/mutation_positions.png)
